title: Social Distancing Needed (with Wendy Chamberlain MP)
itunes:title: Social Distancing Needed (with Wendy Chamberlain MP)
description:
Wendy Chamberlain, Liberal Democrat MP for North East Fife, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker it is hard to see how what the U.K. government is doing now is preventing anything as her party call for Parliament to be recalled for a mini-budget.

In Woolcock's Westminster Take, Bloomberg's James Woolcock reports on the Covid data modelling. Plus Gerard Lyons, Chief Economic Strategist at Netwealth emphasizes the need for economic growth as the solution to the Chancellor Rishi Sunak's omicron dilemma.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

In Woolcock's Westminster Take, Bloomberg's James Woolcock reports on the Covid data modelling. Plus Gerard Lyons, Chief Economic Strategist at Netwealth emphasizes the need for economic growth as the solution to the Chancellor Rishi Sunak's omicron dilemma.
